(:action obtain ; Obtain an item and update its location
 :parameters (?p - person ?i - item ?l - location)
 :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (at ?i ?l) (not (inventory ?p ?i)))
 :effect (and (inventory ?p ?i) (not (at ?i ?l))

(:action kneel ; Kneel and perform a task on a surface
    :parameters (?p - person ?tool - object ?surface - surface)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?tool) (at ?p ?surface) (task_required ?surface))
    :effect (and (kneeling ?p ?surface) (task_performed ?p ?tool ?surface))

(:action wash ; Clean and dry an area
  :parameters (?p - person ?a - area ?c - cleaning_tool)
  :precondition (and (available ?p) (dirty ?a) (has_tool ?p ?c))
  :effect (and (clean ?a) (dry ?a) (not (dirty ?a))
